GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.4.200
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: lpc32xx_udc: Fix refcount leak in lpc32xx_udc_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.200 by commit b75bddfcc18170ce8e3fb695a76ec2dec4ce0ea5, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 24a28e4283510dcd58890379a42b8a7d3201d9d3. For more details please see the references link.
